publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4285 Cathy Jamieson: Away the Bot, Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot FC—That the Parliament congratulates all the players and staff of Auchinleck Talbot FC on their historic eighth victory in the 2009 Citilink Scottish Junior Cup final; further congratulates Auchinleck Talbot FC’s manager, Tommy Sloan, on his second victory in the competition as the club’s manager; recognises the significance of this achievement in Auchinleck Talbot FC’s centenary year; praises the crowd of 8,122, fans of both Auchinleck Talbot FC and Clydebank FC, for creating a fantastic atmosphere at the final in Rugby Park, Kilmarnock; recognises the hard work of the Auchinleck Talbot committee and its strong links with the local community; thanks the people of Mauchline, Catrine and Auchinleck who turned out to welcome the team back to Beechwood Park, and also thanks everyone at the Scottish Junior Football Association and all those involved in junior football at a local level for their support for the game. Supported by: John Scott*, Sarah Boyack*, Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*, Kenneth Gibson*

S3M-4285 Away the Bot, Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot FC (lodged on 1 June 2009) James Kelly*, Jackie Baillie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Sandra White*, Willie Coffey*, Stuart McMillan*, Trish Godman*
S3M-4285 Away the Bot, Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot FC (lodged on 1 June 2009) George Foulkes*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4285 Cathy Jamieson: Away the Bot, Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot FC—That the Parliament congratulates all the players and staff of Auchinleck Talbot FC on their historic eighth victory in the 2009 Citilink Scottish Junior Cup final; further congratulates Auchinleck Talbot FC’s manager, Tommy Sloan, on his second victory in the competition as the club’s manager; recognises the significance of this achievement in Auchinleck Talbot FC’s centenary year; praises the crowd of 8,122, fans of both Auchinleck Talbot FC and Clydebank FC, for creating a fantastic atmosphere at the final in Rugby Park, Kilmarnock; recognises the hard work of the Auchinleck Talbot committee and its strong links with the local community; thanks the people of Mauchline, Catrine and Auchinleck who turned out to welcome the team back to Beechwood Park, and also thanks everyone at the Scottish Junior Football Association and all those involved in junior football at a local level for their support for the game. Supported by: John Scott, Sarah Boyack, Mary Mulligan, Des McNulty, Kenneth Gibson, James Kelly, Jackie Baillie, Patricia Ferguson, Mr Frank McAveety, Sandra White, Willie Coffey, Stuart McMillan, Trish Godman, George Foulkes, Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell*
S3M-4285 Away the Bot, Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot FC (lodged on 1 June 2009) Hugh Henry*
